MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a fault with the power in the EH49 postcode area of Linlithgow. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 10:59pm. Our engineers are on their way to the area and our team will work to get your power back to normal as quickly and as safely as possible by 1am. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:12 PM on Tuesday, 01 December 2020.
